TopicTitle: SU-47, F-16 FIGHTING FALCON, SU-7 and the SU-9.

Articles.Content:
**Oh boy,** i'm excited to share this.

This is my very first thread and... Are those emoticons? Oh yes they are ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

But anyways i have built a few planes for the spacecraft exchange. Enjoy!

If there are any problems with the crafts tell me.

**SU-47**: [http://www./download/y9b3a7yjcv595wb/SU-47.craft](http://www./download/y9b3a7yjcv595wb/SU-47.craft)

![7e6082eabc.jpg](http://puu.sh/hq3Mm/7e6082eabc.jpg)

I love this plane ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

and i might just love this one more

**F-16 FIGHTING FALCON**: [http://www./download/6y2v2e288unfdj1/F-16+FIGHTING+FALCON.craft](http://www./download/6y2v2e288unfdj1/F-16+FIGHTING+FALCON.craft)

Warning: low clearance

![3e21d730e6.jpg](http://puu.sh/hq40S/3e21d730e6.jpg)

2 droptanks

![ff8dd5372f.jpg](http://puu.sh/hq427/ff8dd5372f.jpg)

Buzzing the tower

![e3624fce42.jpg](http://puu.sh/hq42P/e3624fce42.jpg)

And two other planes which are simpler.

**Su-7**:[http://www./download/97z53ns76seas6x/Su-7.craft](http://www./download/97z53ns76seas6x/Su-7.craft)

**Su-9**:[http://www./download/pmnmgrrnbienblj/Su-9.craft](http://www./download/pmnmgrrnbienblj/Su-9.craft)

Su-7

![0851717d53.jpg](http://puu.sh/hq4i8/0851717d53.jpg)

Su-9

![77c5cf9685.jpg](http://puu.sh/hq4f3/77c5cf9685.jpg)

Stick some BDarmory on these and they will rock.
Great craft man ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) i look forward to seeing more of your designs in the future, Have some +rep

Quick tip: Install B9 Aerospace and FAR. You'll get a ton more aerodynamics parts, it's a lifesaver. Downside is that it will mess up your current aircraft's flyability...

Otherwise, nice. I particularly like the Su-9, which looks like it could be made into a MiG-21 with a simple tailplane switch.

And you beat me to the Su-47. With stock parts. o\_o
Very nice! Welcome to the spacecraft exchange! You can start a company in rocket builders (just a list of your crafts) or just post as you build! Have some rep for this neat craft.
That SU-47 looks very nice and clean! Have some rep. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
